name: youtube-downloader
description: A YouTube video downloader web application

scripts.build: npm run install-all && cd client && npm run build
scripts.install-server: cd server && npm install && npm run install-ytdlp
scripts.install-api: cd api && npm install && npm run install-ytdlp
scripts.install-ytdlp: node -e "const {YtDlp} = require('ytdlp-nodejs'); const ytdlp = new YtDlp(); ytdlp.checkInstallationAsync().then(() => console.log('yt-dlp installed')).catch(e => console.error('yt-dlp install error:', e))"
scripts.install-all: npm run install-server && npm run install-client && npm run install-api
